structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Unauthorized Reproduction And Sale Of Live Performances
law.text: Whoever for commercial advantage or private financial gain records or causes to be recorded a live performance with knowledge that such recording is without the consent of the owner, or advertises, sells, rents, transports or causes to be advertised, sold, rented or transported, or possesses for any of such purposes, a recording of a live performance with the knowledge that the live performance was recorded without the consent of the owner, shall be punished as provided in section 143E.
